venue.title: THE VENUE
venue.description: We explore the essence of underground Heavy Metal, attracting a young and dedicated audience. In an authentic and electrifying atmosphere, genre lovers enjoy their favorite live music while savoring our drinks.

home.callToAction:
GET READY FOR THE APOTHEOTIC
SOUND OF HEAVY METAL!

spectrum.subtitle: A concert hall dedicated to Heavy Metal
spectrum.description: A sanctuary for metal lovers, Spectrum offers an unparalleled acoustic experience. Immerse yourself in the fervor of heavy metal in this space equipped with cutting-edge technology, ensuring intense and unforgettable concerts.

footer.culturalSpace: We are a public cultural space recognized by the Murcia City Council.
footer.collaboration: In collaboration with Murcia Live (association of live music venues in the Region of Murcia) and ACCES (Spanish Association of Concert Halls).
footer.proud: We are proud to be part of the vibrant music scene in the area!

footer.description: Join the scene at Sala Spectrum! We are your Heavy Metal home inMurcia. Intense concerts, more powerfuland a unique experience.

cta.title:
LET THE MUSIC
UNITE US!
cta.description:
You can find Sala Spectrum on Instagram,
where we share news, events and content
related to the music you are passionate about.

contact.title: CONTACT US
contact.subtitle: VISIT US WHENEVER YOU WANT
contact.welcome: WELCOME TO THE WORLD OF HEAVY METAL
contact.welcome2: WE LOVE TO READ FROM YOU AFTER YOUR VISIT
contact.address: Address: Av. Ciclista Mariano Rojas, 16, 30009 Murcia
